name: Grim's Dungeon
description:
Grim's Dungeon is a 2D Bullet Hell Shooter in which you crawl through tons of Dungeons. There will be a Stroy Mode and an Arcade mode.

Download the game and unzip it. After you have launched the game you should Check for Updates inside the menu.

The game is ! No more support for the game. We are now all about our newest game "Grim's Quest". An RPG of us.
